Text: Just scanned it and realized the filesize too late. Ill see if I can shrink it or something
If anyone else knows how to shrink it, this was my first scan, and I dont know why each page is 9megs. lol

You probably have it at the highest resolution supported by the scanner. If you go into any good graphic editor or even just Windows Paint, you can scale it down by adjusting the pixel count for each axis.

Better software will give more detailed control. A good optimizer like XAT will let find a balance between compression and image quality.
